channel.title: Brian Cox on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Brian Cox on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Toronto: Brian Cox Trades Logan Roy’s Ruthless Boardroom for the Director’s Chair
item.description: The ‘Succession’ star makes his feature debut behind the camera with ‘Glenrothan,’ a tender, whisky-soaked drama co-starring Alan Cumming, which premieres at TIFF.

item.title: Toronto: Brian Cox Trades Logan Roy’s Ruthless Boardroom for the Director’s Chair
item.description: The ‘Succession’ star makes his feature debut behind the camera with ‘Glenrothan,’ a tender, whisky-soaked drama co-starring Alan Cumming, which premieres at TIFF.

item.title: Toronto Festival Adds Bobby Farrelly, Brian Cox, Aziz Ansari and Guillermo del Toro Films
item.description: World bows have also been added for the latest movies starring Sydney Sweeney, Russell Crowe, Da’Vine Joy Randolph, Angelina Jolie, Seth Rogen, Keanu Reeves and Lily James.
